description.narrative: The project development objective (PDO) is to achieve enhanced transparency and efficiency in the management of public finances andimproved governance and efficiency in the cocoa sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section V | Description :Set up an upgraded Project Financial Management Information System to replace thecurrent system (SUCCESS) which has limited functionalities with regard to reporting, monitoring, and procurement. | Due Date:01-Oct-2014
Finance Agreement :Section V | Description :Update the Procedure Manual particularly regarding the sections on missions and bankarrangements | Due Date :01-Oct-2014
